channel.title: Short on Tech ramblings by Marcin
channel.description: Recent content in Short on Tech ramblings by Marcin

item.title: About me
item.description: Welcome to my corner of the digital world! I’m Marcin Cylke 👋, a multifaceted individual with a passion for software development 💻, the written word 📚, outdoor adventures 🏃‍♂️, and the nostalgic charm of retro computers 🕹️. Professionally, I thrive in the realm of software development, where I craft elegant solutions to complex problems, fueled by creativity and a meticulous attention to detail. From designing user-friendly interfaces to optimizing backend processes, I love diving into the intricacies of code and technology to bring ideas to life.
